articles.description: The NHL on Monday fined Blues left wing David Perron $5,000 for his cross-check on Avalanche center Nazem Kadri during Colorado’s 6-3 win in Game 4 on Tuesday.

articles.title: Jim "Bones" Mackay given major memento that Phil Mickelson never gave him - Golfmagic.com
articles.description: Jim "Bones" Mackay took home the flag from the 18th hole at Southern Hills after Justin Thomas picked up the second Wanamaker Trophy of his career.
articles.content:
Jim "Bones" Mackay is being touted as the best caddie the PGA Tour has ever seen following his guidance of Justin Thomas to his second major title.
